headline: Kraft Heinz (KHC) Valuation Check as Steve Cahillane Takes Helm to Steer Planned Corporate Split
summary: Kraft Heinz (KHC) just handed the keys to Steve Cahillane, the executive who helped split Kellogg and build Kellanova, right as it prepares its own breakup into two standalone companies. See our latest analysis for Kraft Heinz. The leadership reboot and breakup story is landing against a tougher backdrop, with a year to date share price return of negative 19.6 percent and a five year total shareholder return of negative 10.3 percent. However, the recent one week lift hints that investors are...
